notes.p: The ethics component of this research was approved by the Humanities and Social Sciences Delegated Ethics Review Committee at the Australian National University on 16th July 2015, with protocol number 2015/423.

One regional organisation assessed for its adaptation and health support is the Asian Development Bank. Subsequent to conducting the research on which this manuscript was based, the author has been paid for a ten day contract as a resource person by the Asian Development Bank to provide support for a regional Southeast Asian health impact assessment project.
Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
